ADVICE.TITLE: Investment advice
ADVICE.TEXT_PART_1: In order to achieve the average expected return of
ADVICE.TEXT_PART_2: , the advised minimal investment period is
ADVICE.TEXT_PART_3: . If volatile market conditions are the reason for your premature withdrawal, selling at a lower market price only leads to a realization of losses. From a strategic perspective, it would be advisable to increase your investment in your portfolio. This countercyclical investment approach allows you to profit from lower market prices.
ADVICE.DISCUSS_THEM_WITH_AN_ADVISOR_WITH_OUR_TE: Discuss them with an expert with our team.

FEEDBACK.TITLE: Please give us your feedback
FEEDBACK.MESSAGE: Are you worried about your portfolio or unhappy with your performance? To continuously improve our service offering, we would be happy if you provided us with some feedback on why you want to make a withdrawal.

FULL_WITHDRAW.WE_ARE_SAD_TO_SEE_YOU_LEAVE_****: We are sad to see you leave ****.
FULL_WITHDRAW.FULL_WITHDRAW_MESSAGE: To continuously improve our service offering, we would be happy if you provided us with some feedback on why you want to withdraw your entire account balance.
FULL_WITHDRAW.CONFIRM_MESSAGE: I confirm that I am aware that a full withdrawal might be subject to capital gains taxes and market fluctuations and that ****, therefore, cannot guarantee the final withdrawal amount.
FULL_WITHDRAW.AMOUNT_ADDITIONAL_MESSAGE: This amount is subject to change and will depend on the market value of portfolio.
FULL_WITHDRAW.ORDER_TAKES: It requires up to 10 business days for the money to appear in your bank account.

REQUEST.TITLE: New monthly savings rate
REQUEST.NOTIFICATION: Please note that due to the high number of transactions towards the end of month a change of your monthly savings rate 5 or fewer bank working days prior to month end cannot be guaranteed. The change of your monthly savings rate will be implemented latest the following month.

INVITE_FRIENDS_PAGE.TITLE: Invite a friend to join ****
INVITE_FRIENDS_PAGE.FOR_EACH_SUCCESSFUL_RECOMMENDATION: For each successful recommendation of a new customer, you and your friend receive €50 on your **** account, respectively.
INVITE_FRIENDS_PAGE.IF_YOU_WANT_TO_REFER: If you want to refer someone, please share your personal referral code with your friends, which needs to be entered in the corresponding registration field by them.
INVITE_FRIENDS_PAGE.THE_TRANSFER_OF_BONUS: The transfer of the bonus will be made six months after the date of your friend’s account opening, but only if you and your friend are still our customers and if both did not participate in any other promotion. The referral bonus can only be considered if the personal referral code was used.
